kīdṛśeṇa mayā śiva caraṇa smaraṇa dīptena iti

original: śivasya paraśreyaḥsvabhāvasya svātmasthasya cidānandaikamūrteryāni caraṇāni cidraśmayasteṣām
analyzed: śivasya para śreyaḥ svabhāvasya sva ātma sthasya cidānanda eka mūrteḥ yāni caraṇāni cit raśmayaḥ teṣām

original: smaraṇam śabdādiviṣayagrahaṇakāle nibhālanaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ svānubhavāpramoṣastena dīptaḥ
analyzed: smaraṇam śabda ādi viṣaya grahaṇa kāle nibhālanam pratikṣaṇam sva anubhava apramoṣaḥ tena dīptaḥ
te eva kīrtanīya abhidhānena
anyathā katham deha ādi ātma māninaḥ jñāta svātma maheśvara sa tattvasya iyati mahārtha upadeśe

original: 'sya kartṛtādhikāritvamupapadyate yato yo yatsvabhāvaḥ sa tatsvabhāvaṃ vivektuṃ pragalbhata
analyzed: kartṛ tā adhikāri tvam upapadyate yatas yaḥ yad svabhāvaḥ sa tad svabhāvam vivektum pragalbhata
iti upadeṣṭuḥ samāviṣṭa maheśvara svabhāvaḥ nena vākyena uktaḥ syāt iti śivam  /
iti śrī mahā māheśvara ācārya abhinavagupta viracitaḥ paramārthasāraḥ
śrīmataḥ kṣemarājasya sat guru āmnāya śālinaḥ
sākṣātkṛta maheśasya tasya antevāsinā mayā
śrī vitastā purī dhāmnā viraktena tapasvinā
vivṛtiḥ yoga nāmnā iyam pūrṇā dvaya mayī kṛtā
saṃpūrṇā iyam parama artha sāra saṃgraha vivṛtiḥ kṛtiḥ tatrabhavat parama māheśvara śrī rājānaka yoga rājasya
